page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE NEAR BROSELEY
page.content: My name is{Megan Farr.}I live on a farm with my mum and dad and my little sister and brother. On{Saturday} morning my sister and I go to{ballet in{Dawley.}My dad usually takes me. I stay at ballet for about four hours. Mum and dad go{shopping}in {Bridgnorth.}When we get home we go to my grandparents or we play at home. Every night I have to feed the ducks and hens.Sometimes I feed Jack our dog. On{Sunday}I stay in bed reading. We don't usually do much unless we go to grandad's again. I just play or read or help my mum in the garden. My Dad might help my mum in the garden or go to get wood or work on the car. We don't usually have a special Sunday lunch, but a lot of families do. Some people go to church but we don't.
